message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. Take this generous offer and we both win.
Alice, let's be realistic. I'm proposing a 70/30 split in my favor. Take it while it's still a good deal for you. The clock is ticking.
Bob, time is money, and yours is depreciating fast. I'm offering a fair 80/20 split. Don't be greedy.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm lowering my demand to 60/40.  Accept this and we both walk away with something substantial. Don't let greed cloud your judgment.
Bob, I'm trying to be fair, but you're leaving me no choice. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it.

Alice, this is my final offer. 55/45.  You've rejected all my previous offers, even those more generous. It's clear you're aiming to take most of the money. This is the closest to even we're going to get. After this, I'm better off walking away with nothing.
